property.name: description
property.value: Unlike the previous boards on the [[Sword Route]], [[HERO_SWORD]] begins the game with [[HERO_AXE]] and [[HERO_SCARF]] following them. Once they get the [[Sword (Original Game)|sword]], however, they must be killed in order for HERO_SWORD to become strong enough to continue into the [[Manhole Dungeon]].

property.name: description
property.value: A sword in an underground chamber. Allows [[HERO_SWORD]] to kill their party members and enemies in the [[Manhole Dungeon]].

property.name: description
property.value: The cactus can be used to kill [[HERO_SWORD]] if the [[player]] wishes to exit the scenario without killing their party members.

property.name: description
property.value: Manhole providing a one-way connection to an underground dungeon.
